review:
Dr. Ravikumar is extremely empathetic towards his patients. He has been treating my mom over the years.
He has been an excellent advisor for someone who is going through pain and dwelling to take the right decision. His practical advise is testament to his true profession (what we call in local terms Vaidyo Narayano Hari" meaning Doctor is embodiment of God)
Dr, Ravi Kumar is a excellent doctor, I been going with him from so many yrs for any problems he gives good medicine.

*** ****** ** **** ***** knows what he’s doing and answers all questions, I was treated  for pneumonia due to coronavirus and he did a great job and I recovered from it, thanks to the doctor and the nurses wouldn’t be here without them!
**** **** *********. Explains everything clearly. He is our family doctor and we have been consulting him for many years.
